technologyImpact.title: AI-Powered Precision Shade Measurement
technologyImpact.description:
With patented algorithms,
we define color through data, not perception.

item1.title: Calibration â€“ The Standard of True Color
item1.description:
Our proprietary calibration technology
quantifies color into precise numerical values.

item2.title: Deep Learning Error Minimization
item2.description:
Trained with deep learning algorithms,
T-GRID overcomes human limitations and delivers objective data.

item3.title: Certified Solution â€“ T-GRID
item3.description:
Backed by 3 patents (including PCT), venture certification,

patent1.title: Patent 1
patent1.subTitle: Tooth Shade Correction & Judgment
patent1.description:
Method for correcting and determining tooth shades
using reference teeth in clinical images

patent2.title: Patent 2
patent2.subTitle: Object Color Measurement
patent2.description: Method and apparatus for measuring the color of objects

patent3.title: Patent 3
patent3.subTitle: Tooth Shade Correction Device
patent3.description: Method and device for providing tooth shade correction services

item4.title: Color Data Visualization
item4.description: Collected tooth shades are visualized as colormaps, providing data for inventory and research applications.

team.title: The Team Behind AnotherDoctor
team.description:
Our team of doctors, engineers, and designers
is passionate about building products that support healthier lives.

Joseph.name: Joseph / Changhee Jung
Joseph.description:
Hello, and thank you for visiting AnotherDoctor.
For over 20 years, I have dedicated myself to delivering the best care for patients. Through AI-driven digital innovation, AnotherDoctor is standardizing clinical capabilities and striving to provide fair medical services to more people.
We ask for your continued support as we grow into a global healthcare platform.
career: Graduated from Seoul National University, School of Dentistry
Completed KAIST AI Business Executive Program
Completed Periodontology Specialist Program, Samsung Medical Center
